heading: HR00024
0: A RESOLUTION TO INQUIRE AND INVESTIGATE IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON WHAT HAS BEEN TRANSPIRED BY THE NATIONAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION (NBI) AND THE DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE (DOJ) IN NOT ACTING UPON ANY JUDICIAL ACTION ON   THE COMMITTEE REPORT NO. 747 WHICH WAS APPROVED BY THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES PLENARY SESSION LAST AUGIST 15, 2018 IN CONSIDERATION  WITH THE HOUSE RESOLUTION NO. 456 ꞌA RESOLUTION CALLING FOR AN URGENT INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON THE ILLEGAL DRUG TRADING AND  EXTRA JUDICIAL KILLINGS (EJK) ACTIVITIES IN THE PROVINCE OF ZAMBOANGA   DEL NORTEꞌ, RECOMMENDING THE FILING OF CHARGES ON ALL GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS AND LAW ENFORCEMENT PERSONNEL ALLEGEDLY INVOLVED AND MENTIONED BY THE  DOJ-WPP WITNESSES DURING THE CONGRESSIONAL HEARINGS CONDUCTED BY THE  HOUSE COMMITTEE ON DANGEROUS DRUGS
status: Pending with the Committee on JUSTICE since 2019-11-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00024
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION TO INQUIRE AND INVESTIGATE IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON WHAT HAS BEEN TRANSPIRED BY THE NATIONAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION (NBI) AND THE DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE (DOJ) IN NOT ACTING UPON ANY JUDICIAL ACTION ON THE COMMITTEE REPORT NO. 747 WHICH WAS APPROVED BY THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES PLENARY SESSION LAST AUGIST 15, 2018 IN CONSIDERATION WITH THE HOUSE RESOLUTION NO. 456 ꞌA RESOLUTION CALLING FOR AN URGENT INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON THE ILLEGAL DRUG TRADING AND EXTRA JUDICIAL KILLINGS (EJK) ACTIVITIES IN THE PROVINCE OF ZAMBOANGA DEL NORTEꞌ, RECOMMENDING THE FILING OF CHARGES ON ALL GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS AND LAW ENFORCEMENT PERSONNEL ALLEGEDLY INVOLVED AND MENTIONED BY THE DOJ-WPP WITNESSES DURING THE CONGRESSIONAL HEARINGS CONDUCTED BY THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON DANGEROUS DRUGS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : JALOSJOS, ROMEO JR. M.
DATE FILED : 2019-07-01
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON JUSTICE ON 2019-11-27
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2019-07-23;
